Sorry, but no, Deus was not the first game (even though technically it might have been made before Deus Ex). Deus just happens to have a similar name, but has NOTHING to do with the Deus Ex series.

So yes, this game (Deus Ex) is the first game in the Deus Ex series. Lovely game. A bit hard though...
